Administrative Aide III (Utility Worker)

San Vicente, Camarines Norte Full Time ₱ 18,000

Job description

ADMINISTRATIVE AIDE III, SAN VICENTE CAMARINES NORTE

Responsibility

An Administrative Assistant III (Computer Operator) typically has a set of responsibilities that revolve around providing administrative and technical support in the context of computer operations.

  • Office Maintenance: Perform routine cleaning tasks to maintain a clean and orderly office environment.
  • Facility Management: Assist in basic maintenance tasks, such as replacing light bulbs and addressing minor repairs.
  • Mail and Courier Services: Handle incoming and outgoing mail, packages, and courier services.
  • Administrative Support: Assist administrative staff with tasks such as photocopying, scanning, and filing documents.
  • Inventory Management: Monitor and maintain inventory levels of office supplies.

Qualifications

Qualifications for an Administrative Assistant III (Computer Operator) role typically include a combination of education, skills, and experience.

  • Education: High school diploma or equivalent.
  • Experience: Basic knowledge of office maintenance and administrative tasks.
  • Ability: Strong organizational and multitasking abilities.
  • Eligibility: Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a team./ First level eligibility

LGU-San Vicente

San Vicente, Camarines Norte, is a vibrant Local Government Unit (LGU) in the Philippines, committed to fostering community development, providing essential public services, and ensuring the overall well-being of its residents. As an LGU, San Vicente plays a crucial role in local governance, implementing policies and programs that directly impact the lives of its constituents.
